tooltip: This sample application demonstrates how to scan a barcode using the Phonegap* Barcode Scanner plugin to retrieve Universal Product Code (UPC) that can be used for product lookup in a UPC database.
title: Barcode Scanner
description: This sample application demonstrates how to scan a barcode using the Phonegap* Barcode Scanner plugin to retrieve Universal Product Code (UPC) that can be used for product lookup in a UPC database.
